intro: Amesia yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan amesia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its showy, daisy-like flowers. The plant typically grows in alpine and subalpine regions, thriving in cool, moist environments. Its leaves are usually hairy and grayish-green, while its flowers range in color from white to pink. Amesia yunnanensis is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
